simplified: 以其人之道，还治其人之身
traditional: 以其人之道，還治其人之身
pinyin: yi3 qi2 ren2 zhi1 dao4 , huan2 zhi4 qi2 ren2 zhi1 shen1

definitions.yi3 qi2 ren2 zhi1 dao4 , huan2 zhi4 qi2: to use an opponent's own methods to obtain retribution (idiom, from Song dynasty neo-Confucianist Zhu Xi 朱熹); to get revenge by playing sb back at his own game; to give sb a taste of his own medicine;
